description: Wow your guests with this roast lamb recipe. Serve this tender leg of lamb with Mediterranean veggies and top with fragrant basil.
keywords: Roast Leg Of Lamb with Mediterranean Vegetables
name: Roast Leg Of Lamb with Mediterranean Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove lamb from oven and cover loosely with foil. Rest for 15 minutes. Sprinkle lamb and vegetables with basil. Serve with bread.
